shortdesc.ph: Gets user information by passing in a user ID.

p.codeblock: virtual int getUserInfoByUid(uid_t uid, rtc::UserInfo* userInfo) = 0;
public abstract int getUserInfoByUid(int uid, UserInfo userInfo);

section.p: After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK obtains the user ID and user account, caches them in a mapping table, and triggers the callback on the local client. After receiving the callback, you can call and pass in the user ID to get the corresponding user account from the object.

After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK retrieves the user's ID and account and caches them in a mapping table, while triggering the callback on the local client. After receiving this callback, you can call the method and pass in the user ID to obtain the user account of the specified user from the object.
